entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
